constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 190 (Thursday, October 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PERRY:
H.R. 5786.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII of the United States Constitution
[Page H6035]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Defund the People’s Liberation Army Act
